title: Super Sinior C# Backend Developer (with .NET Core & AWS)
description: Position Summary: We are seeking a skilled and passionate C# Backend Developer to join our dynamic development team. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in C# and .NET Core development, with extensive experience working within AWS environments. You will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining scalable and high-performing backend services that meet our business objectives and customer needs. Key Responsibilities: Design and develop robust, scalable, and high-performance backend services using C# and .NET Core. Work closely with the development team to integrate backend services with cloud-based AWS infrastructure. Ensure the implementation of best practices for code quality, security, and performance. Participate in the full software development lifecycle, including requirements analysis, design, implementation, testing, and deployment. Collaborate with cross-functional teams (including front-end developers, UX/UI designers, and product managers) to define and achieve project goals. Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing systems. Contribute to the evolution of our technology stack and development practices. Stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends, and evaluate their applicability to our goals and needs. Required Skills & Qualifications: Master degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. Minimum of 10 years of experience in backend development with a strong proficiency in C# and .NET Core. Proven experience with AWS cloud services (e.g., EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB). Familiarity with RESTful API design and microservices architecture. Solid understanding of database technologies (SQL/NoSQL). Experience with version control tools, such as Git. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication and teamwork abilities. Preferred Skills & Qualifications: Experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes). Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and automation tools. Familiarity with Agile development methodologies. Certifications in AWS or .NET technologies.
